name: Ghost Detective (nobii)
description:
A horror visual novel game that we have to find 5 missing people with your teammate name 'Ghost'.

Before play, this game have:

- jumpscares

- blood, gore

- glitch, flash color

- disturbing pictures

Ghost detective game  have 3 endings:

- Good Ending

- Bad Ending

- True Ending

This game made by Tyranobuilder and it's my first game that have create so if you found any errors in this game feel free to tell me! :>

- nobii
